presentation

Class ViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • presentation.ViewModel

  • public class ViewModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this class is to enable easy access to a selected user.Once a user is selected from the inputed list we can easely access it in Display ,Service and Router with this class in order to perform operations on it.
